answers.author: Gerald Young
answers.text:
Rich,
Bellevue is among the comparison jurisdictions for Clayton, Mo.  They recently shared their benchmarking process in a webinar.  You can view the recording at:  http://icma.org/en/results/center_for_performance_measurement/cpm_participants/program_information/webinar_series.  
For more information, contact Kayla Pacanowski at kpacanowski@claytonmo.gov.

author: Richard Siegel
text:
First, thanks again to Pam Muse and others for answering our question on Cultural Competency.  
We are now looking for actual reports that cities have issued that benchmark their city to other cities either in their local areas, state, region, or nationally.  We would be particularly interested in reports that include the City of Bellevue as a benchmark city.
title: Benchmark Reports
